name: UnderBrush
description:
UnderBrush is a fiction survival game where the player's goal is to collect as many food items without running out of lives! Avoid the enemies by using holes to escape and teleport to a different location on the map!

This group project is by Nisha Steiger, Anthony Frank, and Anna Becker for 80K: Foundations of Game Design course at University of California, Santa Cruz.
